sections.heading: 01|Powers of union terminal companies

sections.heading: 06, inclusive, and 4961.01 to 4961
sections.text: 41, inclusive, of the Revised Code authorizing railroad companies to enter upon and appropriate lands and materials for depots, workshops, and side tracks apply to such union terminal company, whether organized by the presidents of two or more railroad companies or
